meta_description.title: Beyond Good
meta_description.text: We make Single Origin Chocolate at origin in Madagascar. Transparency tastes delicious.

meta_description.title: Beyond Good - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Beyond Good formerly Madécasse, is a Brooklyn-based chocolate and vanilla company established in 2006 by two Peace Corps volunteers who served in Madagascar ...Founder: Tim McCollum, Brett BeachHeadquarters: Brooklyn, New York, United Sta...‎Industry: Foods

meta_description.title: Beyond Good & Evil (video game) - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Beyond Good & Evil was critically acclaimed and is considered one of the greatest video games ever made. Critics praised the game's animation, setting, story ...Release: PlayStation 2: ‎NA‎: November 11, 20...‎Genre(s): Action-adventureEngine: JadeDeveloper(s): Ubisoft Pictures; ‎Ubisoft Milan‎

meta_description.title: Beyond Good by Madécasse - World Wide Chocolate
meta_description.text: BEYOND GOOD is on a mission to change the way the world experiences chocolate, all the way from the cocoa farmer to you, our customers.

meta_description.text: Beyond Good | 2375 followers on LinkedIn. We're on a mission to change the way the world experiences chocolate, from the cocoa farmer to you.

people_also_ask.heading2: Tim McCollum, founder and CEO of Beyond Good, shakes hands with Lalatina, the company's lead cocoa farmer, on a hot day. Photo from Beyond Good. Cocoa beans dry on a cement platform at Lead Cocoa Farmer Lalatina's farm in Madagascar. The drying process typically takes six days.05-Aug-2020

people_also_ask.question: Is Beyond Good chocolate ethical?
people_also_ask.heading: CERTIFIED DIRECT TRADE – This goes above and beyond the standards of Fair Trade certification. We work directly with premium cocoa farmers in Madagascar. ... ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT – Our cocoa grows in an agroforestry environment that contributes to healthy ecosystems and reforestation in Madagascar.
